name: Infrastructure Solution Architect
description:
G-CORE LABS is the world's leading global web services provider with cutting-edge features and advanced security. We provide efficient services for all modern web needs: CDN, Hosting, Storage, Media Platform, Security, Cloud.

The company was founded by experts in high-load systems designing and maintenance in 2011. Our infrastructure is based on 10000 nodes located on 5 continents. In 2013 our infrastructure was awarded the world record by the Guinness Book of Records ("Most Players Online Simultaneously on one MOG Server"). In 2014 our network served up 1 114 000 online gamers simultaneously. G-Core Labs is headquartered in Luxembourg, with offices in Moscow, Minsk, Perm, Vilnius.

We are looking for an Infrastructure Solution Architect to develop our infrastructure.

What you will do:

  • Architecting and implementing network communication, server and data infrastructure solutions
  • Creating server configurations based on customer or business requirements
  • Leading the planning, creation and management of architecture, components, policies and standards for all applicable infrastructure, platforms and environments
  • Building roadmap for acquiring, integrating and implementing high-value technology and processes. Overseeing efforts (e. g. proof of concepts) to measure and prove new technology value
  • Assisting in ongoing evaluation and management of major vendor relationships
  • Maintaining awareness of business issues and needed capabilities, aligning with existing and new industry technologies
  • Establishing strong relationships with key technology stakeholders and providing senior-level technical guidance across the engineering and development teams in order to solve existing infrastructure bottlenecks and problems
  • Documenting reference architectures, patterns, templates and roadmaps
  • Documenting design specifications, installation instructions and other system related information
  • Providing consultative support to other team specialists, sales team and field engineers
  • Active participation in Solution Architect Team communication. Sharing ideas in order to define a complex solution
Required Skills:
  • Higher technical education
  • 5+ years of technical experience in a server solutions architect profile
  • Experience in network and server equipment design creation, implementation, administration, capacity planning, performance management
  • Knowledge of English (Intermediate)

Desired Skills:

  • Deep understanding of data center network equipment, data center infrastructure, server equipment
  • In-depth knowledge of server hardware manufacturers and market trends
  • Understanding of virtualization technologies (OpenStack, VMware)
  • Ability to create and present complex technical topics to both executive and technical personnel
  • Ability to translate business requirements into consistent, compliant solutions and provide a budget estimation

We offer:

  • Official employment, observance of the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
  • Office in the center of Moscow or ability to work remotely;
  • A Full-time, flexible schedule is possible;
  • Competitive official salary;
  • Medical insurance (dental services included);
  • Corporate parties;
  • English courses (Skyeng);
  • Excellent coffee, tea, fruit, snacks in the office.
